attributes.action: Intervene to prevent the proposed closure of Twigworth Post office in Gloucestershire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Twigworth Post Office is a vital community resource. In the time of the floods when the area was surrounded The other post offices were impossible to reach.  The office serves a large proportion of pensioners.  The bus links to Gloucester are very pooor and this is a shortsigthed move.
